programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A teenager vanishes from her home one fall morning in 1999. Her body is discovered 17 days later, seven miles away. It takes more than 15 years for the heartbreaking truth to come out.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: Mikey’s getting married soon and the clock is ticking to get his teeth picture-perfect. Lynn’s embarrassed by the color of her teeth and won’t wait another moment for a white smile. Can the FIXT team get the work done in time?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Growing up, two siblings hear unsettling stories about their family's history. They don't know what to believe about the ones who went missing in 1992, until, decades later, the haunting truth comes out.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Six people are slain in a home in a quiet Iowa town. One person survives a gunshot to the head and claims to have no memory of the incident. The tragedy and eventual trial shred the social fabric of the neighborhood.

programme.title: This is Iowa
programme.desc: A Decade of Stories

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: These criminals may not have blood on their hands, but they still leave despair in their wake. From shady non-profits to fraudulent contractors, to wide-spread postal theft, here are some of the most devastating white-collar crimes to be attempted across the country.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Teaching STEM to the next generation is opening a new world of possibilities for career opportunities, connection and inspiration.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A young boy and his family's housekeeper are brutally killed in an upscale Omaha neighborhood. Their case goes cold for years, until another double homicide reveals the link and unmasks a serial killer.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Nick packed up his family and moved to Savannah to be closer to nature. But since the move, he hasn’t been able to disconnect from work. Kinga takes him away from his desk to explore what the great state of Georgia has to offer.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Nigerian-born Phd student Melvin hopes that finding love in Cincinnati is not as hard as rocket science, and he’s about to experiment with three blind dates. Three Cincy ladies will try to win him over with bowling, cupcake making and rock climbing.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day learn that in Homestead, looks can be deceiving. The guys throw axes in a bank, zip line in a church, and end the day with a beer at Duke's.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: Loosen that belt: Today we're filling up on comforting classics. From thick focaccia pizza to the juiciest smoked brisket, we guarantee there won't be room for dessert.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Humans have been drawn to tales of hidden treasures, figurative and literal, for centuries. From prehistoric shark teeth to unmarked graves, to a field of irises with a clue to a lost community, each uncovered item has a history to be cherished.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Printmaking is showcased in Greenville as three young artists vie to take the creative crown. Artistry is put to the test as these makers carve, color and print over two days and four hours to create art-worthy new heights.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: A duo pulls a Bonnie and Clyde in a truck stolen from a dealership, and a pair takes money from a monastery. These shocking stories of couples in crime have to be witnessed to be believed.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Former teacher Craig Falk is hitting the (cook)books against former lawyer Laurie Boucher. Which of these second-career chefs best showcases their culinary skills to craft the perfect packed lunch?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Esquire’s Dave Holmes chats with Girls5eva’s Busy Philipps. Dave and Busy play Travels and Tribulations, and Dave shares his Esquire-approved itinerary for things to do in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: Get a serious sugar rush as four of Pittsburgh’s purveyors of delicious desserts share their stories and their sweets.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: Danny’s a family man now and needs to upgrade his smile, damaged by past drug use. But he’s been burned by dentists before. Tattoo artist Craig claims that no one’s been able to give him teeth he won’t break. Will their faith in dentists be restored?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Sometimes, would-be criminals are their own worst enemies. This episode highlights crime “fails,” and the officers - and ordinary civilians - who save the day.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: A look at daring escapes from custody and the breakouts that take on many forms – yet always involve finding and exploiting the weakest parts of the system.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: In these real-life stories of the illicit drug trade, learn how law enforcement beats the smugglers in their high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Only In
programme.desc: Every city has its own local flavor, culture and vibe. Only In celebrates communities across America and the people, activities and history that make each place unique. From must-try activities to hidden gems and hotspots, to dedicated changemakers, these stories are sure to inspire a deeper love and appreciation for your hometown and beyond.

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Host and comedic actor Amy Brassette McKeon challenges two sets of couples to pass a good time on a dime in their city. Find out which couple will experience the most amazing date for under fifty bucks.

programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
